column2: Commander, we need an immediate deployment. We've been in pursuit of a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} terrorist for months, and we've finally tracked them to this planet. They've gone to ground but earlier today one of our orbital units spotted them moving on the surface. This is the first verified sighting we've had of the target, and we want you to bring them down immediately, before they're able to slip away again. There hasn't been time to do a full survey of the AO, so you'll be going in blind.

column3: False Security

column2: Did you really just drop into my backyard with that lance? I'm offended. This won't even be a challenge.
column3: Did you really just drop into my backyard with that lance? I'm offended. This won't even be a challenge.

column2: Commander, that transmission's coming from this area. They're not even bothering to hide.
column3: Commander, that transmission's coming from this area. They're not even bothering to hide.

column2: Hide? Don't be an idiot. You only found me because I wanted to be found. Let's play, children.
column3: Hide? Don't be an idiot. You only found me because I wanted to be found. Let's play, children.

column2: Boss, I don't think I like this person at all.
column3: Boss, I don't think I like this person at all.

column2: Target destroyed, Commander.
column3: Target destroyed, Commander.

column2: Target's 'Mech destroyed, you amateurs.
column3: Target's 'Mech destroyed, you amateurs.

column2: Oh you have got to be kidding me. They're broadcasting from orbit, Darius. They were never even here.
column3: Oh you have got to be kidding me. They're broadcasting from orbit, Darius. They were never even here.

column2: I'm guessing that didn't go the way you'd hoped? Shame.
column3: I'm guessing that didn't go the way you'd hoped? Shame.

column2: That wasn't nearly as difficult as we'd been led to believe. Commander, you're clear to evac.
column3: That wasn't nearly as difficult as we'd been led to believe. Commander, you're clear to evac.

column2: The bigger they are, I guess. I'll meet you at this LZ, boss.
column3: The bigger they are, I guess. I'll meet you at this LZ, boss.

column2: The target we'd like your people to eliminate is a notorious killer-for-hire who goes by the name 'The Professional'. They're currently under contract with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}, and they've been spotted here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, which is extremely concerning for our interests. This mercenary is cagey and cautious and will attempt escape at any indication that they're overmatched. We'd like you to land a low-tonnage lance to engage them, to give them a false sense of security, and then eliminate them before they can escape. We're prepared to offer very generous salvage terms.
column3: The target we'd like your people to eliminate is a notorious killer-for-hire who goes by the name 'The Professional'. They're currently under contract with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}, and they've been spotted here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, which is extremely concerning for our interests. This mercenary is cagey and cautious and will attempt escape at any indication that they're overmatched. We'd like you to land a low-tonnage lance to engage them, to give them a false sense of security, and then eliminate them before they can escape. We're prepared to offer very generous salvage terms.

column2: Orbital recon shows a group of military units in the vicinity; we believe that's the objective.

column2: An elite MechWarrior has been deployed to take command of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces in this system. We need a skilled mercenary force to remove this MechWarrior before they reach their command, while they're only lightly escorted. Every downed 'Mech will help our cause, so there will be a bonus for complete destruction of the target's supporting forces. Additionally, the MechWarrior's command may send out an escort unit to meet them; expect enemy reinforcements once you engage.

column2: There's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, involved in keeping the peace. He helped out with some of our operations, and in turn we kept him supplied with things he couldn't get on the open market, if you know what I mean. But he's started talking to the authorities, and making threats about exposing our business. We want you to put a stop to that. He's probably gonna try to make a break for it. Don't let him escape.
column3: There's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, involved in keeping the peace. He helped out with some of our operations, and in turn we kept him supplied with things he couldn't get on the open market, if you know what I mean. But he's started talking to the authorities, and making threats about exposing our business. We want you to put a stop to that. He's probably gonna try to make a break for it. Don't let him escape.

column2: The Price of Freedom
column3: The Price of Freedom

column2: This is where our employers said to look for the target.
column3: This is where our employers said to look for the target.

column2: From here, you should be able to get eyes on him, Commander.

column2: Once he's down, head to the evac point for your pickup.

column2: Well done, Commander. Let's go get paid.

column2: This is a disaster. Commander, I'm pulling the plug on this operation.

column2: It's reached a point where we can no longer operate in {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, Commander, and it's all thanks to a particular {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior tasked with tracking down our activities in this region. We're tired of letting him pick the time and place of battle, so we'd like you to give him a little surprise visit while he's on patrol. He'll be defended and given his paranoia he'll probably have backup waiting nearby, so watch for an ambush.
column3: It's reached a point where we can no longer operate in {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, Commander, and it's all thanks to a particular {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} MechWarrior tasked with tracking down our activities in this region. We're tired of letting him pick the time and place of battle, so we'd like you to give him a little surprise visit while he's on patrol. He'll be defended and given his paranoia he'll probably have backup waiting nearby, so watch for an ambush.

column2: We're certain she's in this area. Move up and make contact with her and her escorts.

column2: One of our covert facilities was breached, Commander, in what appears to have been an inside job. A MechWarrior stationed there murdered the rest of the staff and is defecting to {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, taking a valuable {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} 'Mech with her. The facility is a total loss, but we don't want that 'Mech falling into enemy hands. Track down the renegade and destroy her 'Mech. We believe she's being escorted by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, and there's a bonus if you destroy them as well.
column3: One of our covert facilities was breached, Commander, in what appears to have been an inside job. A MechWarrior stationed there murdered the rest of the staff and is defecting to {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, taking a valuable {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} 'Mech with her. The facility is a total loss, but we don't want that 'Mech falling into enemy hands. Track down the renegade and destroy her 'Mech. We believe she's being escorted by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, and there's a bonus if you destroy them as well.

column2: We periodically survey 'empty' worlds just to be certain there's no unexpected activity on them. This time, we got lucky. A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} surveillance team picked up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} signals from the surface of {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} that correspond to a very heavy 'Mech running through a test-fire sequence. We suspect the enemy is taking the 'Mech out for proving trials, figuring the planet is uninhabited. If we can locate and intercept this 'Mech, we can keep a powerful piece of hardware out of enemy hands.
column3: We periodically survey 'empty' worlds just to be certain there's no unexpected activity on them. This time, we got lucky. A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} surveillance team picked up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} signals from the surface of {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} that correspond to a very heavy 'Mech running through a test-fire sequence. We suspect the enemy is taking the 'Mech out for proving trials, figuring the planet is uninhabited. If we can locate and intercept this 'Mech, we can keep a powerful piece of hardware out of enemy hands.
